meanings.definition: A person of obscure origin who has gained wealth, influence, or social status.
meanings.sent1: The parvenus at the party were talking loudly about their new expensive cars.
meanings.sent2: The parvenus in the neighborhood were always hosting lavish parties.
meanings.sent3: The parvenus tried to impress everyone with their fancy clothes, but ended up spilling drinks on themselves.
meanings.sent4: The parvenus climbed the social ladder so quickly, they seemed to have forgotten where they started.
meanings.sent5: The parvenus' rise from rags to riches was the talk of the town.
